user.title: BMW Cardata
user.description: Enter your BMW CarData client ID.

authorize.title: Authorize BMW CarData
authorize.description: Open {verification_url} and enter the user code {user_code} if asked. Once you've approved the device, click Submit. If approval already completed, click Submit again to continue.

blocked.title: Bootstrap disabled due to API rate limit
blocked.description: The integration previously hit the BMW API daily rate limit and automatic bootstrap (container creation and mapping) has been temporarily disabled for {entry_title} until {until}. You can either wait until that time and try again, or clear the flag below to retry immediately (you may hit the rate limit again).

cleared.title: Bootstrap retry scheduled
cleared.description: You have cleared the temporary disable flag for {entry_title}. The integration will attempt bootstrap again. If it still hits the BMW API rate limit, the integration will disable bootstrap until the reset time again. Alternatively, use the developer service `cardata.clean_hv_containers` to list/delete old containers (be mindful of API rate limits).

blocked_fallback.description: Automatic bootstrap is disabled until {until}. Clear the flag to retry now, or cancel and try again after the reset.

error.authorization_failed: BMW authorization was not completed. This usually means you clicked 'Deny', closed the page before approving, or the request timed out. Error details: {error}. Please remove the integration and try adding it again, making sure to click 'Approve' when BMW asks for permission.
error.device_code_failed: BMW rejected the device authorization request ({error}). Check that the client ID is valid and try again.

abort.auth_failed: BMW authorization response was incomplete (missing tokens). Please try again.
abort.reauth_device_code_failed: BMW rejected the device authorization request ({error}). Update the client ID under Configure > Start device authorization again, or remove and re-add the integration.
abort.reauth_missing_client_id: Client ID is missing for this integration entry. Remove and re-add the integration to authorize again.
abort.reauth_failed: Reauthorization could not be started. Try again from the integration options.

init.title: Manual actions
init.description: Select the action you want to run. Refresh tokens tries to just refresh the tokens without reauth. We suggest restarting HA after that if you have problems.

data_description.enable_charging_history: Fetches charging session history from BMW once per day. Uses 1 additional API call per vehicle per day from your 50-call daily quota.
data_description.enable_tyre_diagnosis: Fetches tyre health and wear data from BMW once per day. Uses 1 additional API call per vehicle per day from your 50-call daily quota.

action_mqtt_broker.title: MQTT Broker
action_mqtt_broker.description: Configure a custom MQTT broker instead of the BMW endpoint. Use this with bmw-mqtt-bridge to replay BMW data from a local broker, allowing multiple consumers to share a single BMW MQTT connection.

data_description.custom_mqtt_enabled: When enabled, connects to your custom broker instead of BMW's MQTT endpoint.
data_description.custom_mqtt_host: Hostname or IP address of your MQTT broker.
data_description.custom_mqtt_port: Port number (default: 1883 for plain TCP, 8883 for TLS).
data_description.custom_mqtt_tls: Off = plain TCP, TLS = verified certificate, TLS (self-signed) = skip certificate validation.
data_description.custom_mqtt_topic_prefix: The bridge topic prefix. Messages are expected at {prefix}{vin}. Default: bmw/

error.runtime_missing: Integration runtime is not ready. Try again after setup completes.
error.no_vins: No VINs are known yet. Wait for the stream to discover a vehicle or trigger it once manually.
error.invalid_client_id: Enter the BMW CarData client ID.
error.mqtt_host_required: Broker host is required when custom MQTT is enabled.

abort.auth_failed: BMW authorization response was incomplete (missing tokens). Please try again.
abort.reauth_started: Authorization restarted. Complete the new login flow from the notification.
abort.reauth_device_code_failed: BMW rejected the device authorization request ({error}). Update the client ID in the integration options and try again.
abort.reauth_missing_client_id: Client ID is missing for this integration entry. Remove and re-add the integration to authorize again.
abort.reauth_failed: Reauthorization could not be started. Try again from the integration options.
